statements: DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE vr_experience_preference = 'high' AND theme_preference = 'dark';
DELETE FROM VRActivities WHERE activity_type='exploration' AND user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM VRPreferences WHERE vr_experience = 'Immersive' AND display_settings->>'$[*].mode' = 'Dark';
DELETE FROM VRSettings WHERE vr_experience = 'Virtual Reality' AND resolution = '1080p';
DELETE FROM ExperiencePreferences WHERE user_id = 5 AND rating > 3;
DELETE FROM DeviceFeatures WHERE device_id = 2 AND resolution = '1920x1080';
